common.name: Name
common.must-be-max-ten: Must be a maximum of 10 digits
common.must-be-valid-email: Email must be a valid email address

hero.legend: Transfer crypto easily through WhatsApp using our Web3 platform.

card-1.title: Make the blockchain complexity invisible
card-1.description: Hide passphrases, transaction approval pop-ups, and sponsor gas fees for transactions. We handle all the technical stuff for you.

card-2.title: Transfer money easily
card-2.description: Simply send a text message via WhatsApp to transfer, receive, swap and store value.

card-3.title: Invoice and notify payments effortlessly
card-3.description: Request Crypto payments via WhatsApp. Issue dynamic invoices, get paid in various currencies, and receive notifications on completion.

msg.enter-phone: Enter phone number with area code, without 0 and without 15
msg.code-sent: We sent a 6-digit code to the phone number
msg.code-info: Please enter the 6-digit code we sent to the WhatsApp number provided.
msg.invalid-user: User not found with that phone number

register.title: Facilitate seamless payments and transfers through ChatterPay
register.by-signing: By signing up, I agree to
